Of course! Here are some comforting words for you:

1. "Everything will be okay. This too shall pass."
2. "You are stronger than you think, and you have the power to overcome any challenge."
3. "Remember that you are not alone. Reach out to your loved ones for support."
4. "Take a deep breath and trust in the journey. Sometimes, the toughest moments lead to the most beautiful destinations."
5. "You have faced difficult times before, and you have always come out stronger. Believe in yourself."
6. "Give yourself permission to rest and heal. It's okay to take a break and take care of yourself."
7. "You are deserving of love, happiness, and peace. Don't forget to be kind to yourself."
8. "Remember that setbacks are not failures. They are opportunities for growth and learning."
9. "You are capable of handling whatever comes your way. Have faith in your resilience."
10. "No matter how dark it may seem, there is always a glimmer of hope. Hold onto that light and let it guide you."

Remember, tough times don't last forever, and you have the strength within you to overcome any adversity. Take care of yourself and keep moving forward.
